title: What is the name of this Stencil Font
content:
I'm trying to figure out the name of this typeface. It would be great if anyone can help me out. Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416005727im_/http:/typophile.com/files/shapeimage_2_5317.png)
author: vraswant

comments.content: So this is a typography forum huh?

Yes, the best one.

1) You posted in the wrong section. Extremely few people who ID type bother looking at anything beyond the ID section. Maybe because:  
2) To repurpose a famous quote from Cassandre: IDing type is to typography what rape is to love.

hhp
